meanings.sent1: The lizard's skin felt keratose to the touch.
meanings.sent2: The turtle's shell is keratose and provides protection.
meanings.sent3: The keratose surface of the rock made it difficult to climb.
meanings.sent4: The old tree bark was so keratose, it seemed like armor.
meanings.sent5: The keratose scales of the fish shimmered in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: The hair product claimed to make hair more keratose.
meanings.sent2: The feather's keratose structure helped the bird fly.
meanings.sent3: The chef's keratose recipe made the dish extra crunchy.
meanings.sent4: The keratose fibers in the fabric made it durable.
meanings.sent5: The keratose appearance of the nail indicated good health.

meanings.sent1: The keratose callus on his hand showed his hard work.
meanings.sent2: The keratose feel of the fruit skin hinted at its freshness.
meanings.sent3: The keratose surface of the statue made it look ancient.
meanings.sent4: The keratose texture of the leaf protected it from insects.
meanings.sent5: The keratose quality of the material made it suitable for heavy use.
